CustomField.formula: IF( ( ISBLANK( DMS_Doc_Id__c )|| !$Permission.Sec_Operation_DocCheck_CCO_Edit ), "", IF( !Document_Check_Sesuai__c || $Permission.Sec_Operation_DocCheck_CCO_Edit || CONTAINS(Document_Group__c, "FKD"), HYPERLINK( "/lightning/action/quick/Document_BFI__c.Edit_Notes" & "?objectApiName&context=RECORD_DETAIL&recordId=" & CASESAFEID(Id) & "&backgroundContext=%2Flightning%2Fr%2FOperation__c%2F" & Loan__r.Operation__c & "%2Fview&retUrl=", "Edit", "_self" ), "" ) )
CustomField.label: Action
